content:
Abruptly, the slippery surface of the ooze loses its texture and color. For a moment, it seems to be shifting back into its original blobby form. Then the ripples run across its skin, and the entity begins to take on a new form!

Replace the being that Trail of Ooze is attached to with a random being from the Shapeshifter deck. Attach Trail of Ooze to the new being and move all   and   to the new being. Shuffle the previous being into the Shapeshifter deck. Then, if the new being has ambush, resolve it.
